entry.sentence: `` It 's incredible , '' Professor Sondstrup whispered almost reverently as he walked up and down beside the motionless Seismosaurus .

entry.sentence: Even after they had driven the Seismosaurus to change direction with the stun grenades , the giant had held on for several more minutes , trudging on for a good quarter of a mile , though without endangering anyone .
